column2: 3.3 Acre Land for Sale in Batticaloa
column6: This approximately 3.3 acre land is situated in between Pasikudha and Batticaloa is ideal for commercial purposes. With scenic views overlooking the Batticaloa Lagoon/ River.It is very close to the main Trincomalee /Batticaloa Road, Pipe borne water and electricity is readily available. Clear Title Deed.

19 perches freehold square block land for sale in Vantharumoolai, Batticaloa. The land situated 200 m away from Batticaloa Trincomalee highway, and near to Eastern University (500m) too. The quiet environment and suitable for a residential area. This 19 perch land is very close to the Chenkalady town which has access to all amenities. Also, has a clear deed, access to water, electricity and all amenities.  Price of per perch Rs 145,000/- or whole land Rs 2,755,000/-.Price can be slightly negotiated after inspection.For more details contact - The inspection could be arranged on prior appointment. Kindly, genuine buyers contact (Please avoid brokers).

Passikudah, meaning “green-algae-bay” is situated in Eastern seaboard of Sri Lanka between Kalkudah and the Indian Ocean, The turquoise blue waters of the bay attracts local and foreign tourist to this wide sandy place under the hot tropical sun to surf, swim or just frolic in the water. Many other activities are available from kite surfing, surfing and sailing across in a canoe.Pasikuda beach has ranked as 3rd best beach among the world.12.5 acre free hold square block land situated in Passikudah for immediate sale.  Land can be sold as 2 plots or as whole plot. Perfect area to build up beach resort & villas. Rear opportunity as there is no properties available in the area. Area is fully attracted by luxuries hotels and villas, i.e. hotels namely Malu Malu Resort & Spa, Uga Bay by Uga Escapes. Area is fully attracted by the local and foreigners. Only 6 hour drive from Katunayake International Airport & 2 hours to Sigiriya and 15 min Kalkudah Beach.
